fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Consumer rights, taxation, environmental, transport and travel, motor vehicle, leasing and renting, data and connected vehicles
organisation_name: British Vehicle Rental and Leasing Association (BVRLA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The BVRLA works in the interests of the UK vehicle rental and leasing industry 
 
The BVRLA campaigns on a variety of issues in the UK and Europe to protect and advance the interests of the vehicle rental and leasing industry. 
 
The association helps its members maintain the most professional standards with the help of its code of conduct, inspection programme and conciliation service. 
 
The association provides a comprehensive business and legal support service, including a range of fact sheets and guides.
